name: Nectarpolis
description:
Made for 32bit jam 2021

by igorsgames and alexsilent

Godot Engine

font - Open Sans Condensed by Steve Matteson

Use WASD or arrows to move, Space to interact, Enter for pause in levels

Gamepad may probably work too :)

First you have to visit the ministry building, then you'll hopefully figure it out!

Known issues:

- red enemy is not very smart;

- sometimes the power-up preview shows shield, but you get something else instead;

- red enemies and flowers sometimes flicker.
